{{velocity output=false}} #macro (__label $propName $cssClass $text) #set($displayedText = "$!{text}") #if ($displayedText == '' && "$!{propName}" != '') #set($displayedText = "$!{class.get($propName).translatedPrettyName}") #end #if ($displayedText.matches('.*\w')) #set ($displayedText = $displayedText.concat(':')) #end #if ($xcontext.action != 'edit') (% class="label $!{cssClass}" %)${displayedText}(%%)## #else #set($for = '') #if ("$!{propName}" != '') #set($for = "for='$!{class.name}_$!{obj.number}_$!{propName}'") #end {{html clean="false" wiki="false"}}{{/html}}## #if ($services.localization.get("$!{class.name}_${propName}_hint")) #* Empty comment needed for the whitespace trimmer to leave an empty space before the icon *# {{icon name="question-circle" cssClass="xHelpButton" title="$services.localization.render("$!{class.name}_${propName}_hint").replace('"', '~~~"')"/}}## #end #end #end #macro (__expandTools) {{html clean="false" wiki="false"}}

add leading 0-s to 1-digit month and days, if missing #set ($displayedValue = $displayedValue.replaceAll('(?<=(^|\D))(\d)(\D|$)', '0$2$3')) $!escapetool.xml($displayedValue) #end #elseif ($value) #set ($value = $services.jodatime.getMutableDateTime($value.time)) #set ($discard = $value.setZoneRetainFields($services.jodatime.UTCTimezone)) $!services.jodatime.getDateTimeFormatterForPattern($format).print($value) #end #end #end #macro (__displayPropertyAsSelect $suggest_script) #if ($xcontext.action == 'edit' || $xcontext.action == 'inline') {{html wiki=false clean=false}} {{/html}} #end #macro (_fms__displayValue $v $counter) #if($xcontext.action == 'edit' || $xcontext.action == 'inline') {{html wiki=false clean=false}} {{/html}} #else $!{escapetool.xml($services.rendering.escape($v, $doc.syntax))} #end #end (% class="xwiki-free-multiselect"%) #foreach ($v in $value) 1. #_fms__displayValue($v ${foreach.count}) #end #if ((!$value || $value.size() == 0) && ($xcontext.action == 'edit' || $xcontext.action == 'inline')) 1. #_fms__displayValue('' 1) #end #end ## ===================================================================== ## ## "Tabelar" data associated with the patient report ## ## #macro (__measurements_displayCompact) #set($dataClass = $xwiki.getDocument('PhenoTips.MeasurementsClass').xWikiClass) #if ($dataClass) #set($dataObjects = $doc.getObjects('PhenoTips.MeasurementsClass')) #if ($dataObjects.size() == 0) (% class="hint" %)None specified #else (% class="extradata-list" %) #foreach ($o in $dataObjects) #foreach($prop in $dataClass.properties) #if ($prop.name == 'date' || $prop.name == 'age') |= ${prop.translatedPrettyName}: |=(% colspan="2" %) $doc.display($prop.getName(), $o) #elseif (!$prop.name.endsWith('_evaluation') && "$!o.getProperty($prop.getName()).value" != '') |= ${prop.translatedPrettyName}: | $doc.display($prop.getName(), $o) | $!doc.display("${prop.getName()}_evaluation", $o) #end #end #end## foreach object #end## if $dataObjects.size() #end## if dataclass #end ## ===================================================================== ## ## PHENOTYPE METADATA ## ## #macro (__phenotypeMeta_displayEntry $targetObj) #set($dataClass = $targetObj.xWikiClass) #set($enabledProperties = ['age_of_onset', 'pace_of_progression', 'severity', 'temporal_pattern', 'spatial_pattern', 'laterality', 'comments', 'supporting_images', 'supporting_documents']) #set($collapsibleProperties = ['age_of_onset', 'pace_of_progression', 'severity', 'temporal_pattern', 'spatial_pattern', 'laterality']) #set($targetId = "phenotypeMeta__$!{class.name}_$!{obj.number}_$!{targetObj.getProperty('target_property_name').value}__$!{targetObj.getProperty('target_property_value').value}") {{html wiki="true" clean="false"}}## {{html wiki="false" clean="false"}}

$doc.display($prop.getName(), $targetObj)

'PhenoTips.PhenotypeMetaClass') #set ($objects = $doc.getObjects($dataClassName)) (% class="hidden" id="phenotype-meta-tmp-container" %)((( #foreach ($pmObj in $objects) #__phenotypeMeta_displayEntry($pmObj) #end ))) #end ## ===================================================================== ## ## PHENOTYPE SUMMARY ## ## #macro (__phenotypeSummary_create $phenotypesSummary $hasSymptoms) #set ($patient = $services.patients.get($doc.name)) #set($qualifiers = $patient.getData('global-qualifiers')) #foreach ($q in ['global_age_of_onset', 'global_mode_of_inheritance']) #foreach ($t in $qualifiers.get($q)) #set ($discard = $phenotypesSummary.add({"key" : $t.id, "text" : $t.name, "type" : 'symptom'})) #end #end #foreach ($f in $patient.features) #if ("$!f.id" != '') #set ($foreach.fterm = $services.vocabularies.resolveTerm($f.id)) #if ($foreach.fterm) #set ($foreach.fname = $foreach.fterm.translatedName) #else #set ($foreach.fname = $f.id) #end #else #set ($foreach.fname = "$!f.name") #end #if ($foreach.fname != '') #set ($discard = $phenotypesSummary.add({ "key" : "#if($f.id == '')$foreach.fname#{else}$f.id#end", "text" : "$foreach.fname", "type" : "#if (!$f.isPresent())not_#elseif($f.id == '')free_#{end}symptom" })) #end #end #set ($hasSymptoms = ($phenotypesSummary.size() > 0)) #end ## ===================================================================== ## ## GENE SUMMARY ## ## #macro (__geneSummary_create $genesSummary) #set ($patient = $services.patients.get($doc.name)) #set($genes = $patient.getData('genes')) #foreach ($g in $genes) #set ($discard = $genesSummary.add({"key" : $g.id, "status" : $g.status})) #end #end ## Labeled External ID data ## ## #macro (__externalIdentifier_updatePresets $presets) #set ($presetLabelParam = 'label') #set ($eidLabelParam = 'label') #set ($preferencesClassName = 'XWiki.XWikiPreferences') #set ($discard = $presetEid.set($eidLabelParam, $propertyLabel)) #set ($discard = $doc.save('Added a preset external identifier label', true)) #end #end #end #end #macro
